generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, including a large white arrow painted on the surface, indicating a turn or merge.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right edge of the road, where pedestrians are walking.
- building: A stone building with a dark roof is prominently visible in the center background, and other residential buildings are visible to the right.
- vegetation: Several trees with autumn-colored leaves are visible along the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Two people are walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including one directly ahead with headlights on, and others parked or driving in the distance.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, showing red lights.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a round "no entry" sign and a blue directional sign on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible along the sidewalk on the right side.
